name: Jace's Projection
originalText:
Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Jace's Projection.
{3}{U}: Put a loyalty counter on target Jace planeswalker.

rulings.text: If an effect instructs you to draw multiple cards, the triggered ability of Jace’s Projection triggers that many times.
If a spell or ability causes you to put cards into your hand without specifically using the word “draw,” the triggered ability of Jace’s Projection won’t trigger.
Putting a loyalty counter on a Jace planeswalker doesn’t cause any of its activated abilities to become activated.

text:
Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Jace's Projection.
{3}{U}: Put a loyalty counter on target Jace planeswalker.
